bike.description: 6011 hydroformed butted aluminum mainframe & chainstays, co-molded carbon seatstays, cold-forged dropouts, Genesisters 2 Geometry

components.description: Fox F120RL, 120mm travel, custom G2 Geometry 46mm offset crown, air spring, external rebound adjustment
Shimano M525 w/M570 (LX) freehub/Bontrager Race sealed front hub, Bontrager Duster tubeless ready* 28mm wide disc rims, 32h
Bontrager XDX, 2.2 (58/56), 60 TPI, aramid folding bead
Bontrager Race Fit Lux, hollow cromoly rails, lightweight padding
Bontrager Race, 2014 aluminum shaft, two-bolt rocker head
Bontrager Race OS Riser, 25mm rise, 630 width, 6d backsweep, 3d upsweep, 31.8mm
Avid Juicy 5, hydraulic disc, 185mm front/160mm rear G2 Clean Sweep 6-bolt rotors
